question: India signed an agreement with which country, to cooperate in health and medicine and support 'Green healthcare'?
explanation:
India and Israel have recently signed an agreement to cooperate in the fields of health and medicine, replacing the old agreement signed in September 2003.
The two countries also agreed to share their expertise in building climate resilient infrastructure and support 'Green healthcare' or Climate resilient Hospital infrastructure. It will also promote cooperation in exchange and training of health professionals.
